channel.title: PORTFOLIO on Mart Jürisoo
channel.description: Recent content in PORTFOLIO on Mart Jürisoo

item.title: UFC Rankings Website
item.description: This is a page that visualizes and summarizes the individual rankings that make up the overall UFC rankings. Unlike the official UFC rankings, all vote-receiving fighters are listed, not only the top 15. Note: Unfortunately, the UFC have since hid the individual rankings and only display the aggregate rankings.

item.title: Twitter Book Bot
item.description: @TheLawByBastiat is a Twitter bot that tweets out the book The Law by Frédéric Bastiat one sentance at a time. It will take roughly 2 years to finish the whole book.

item.title: Scott Horton Show Episode Finder
item.description: The Scott Horton Show is the world’s finest anti-war podcast/radio show that’s been airing since 1999. Now at over 5,000 episodes, this webpage was created to help finding episodes by guest and/or the topic. In 2020, God willing, I will remake the page in JavaScript.

item.title: International Football Results Database
item.description: This is a database of every international football result ever. Or quite close to that. I created it before the 2018 World Cup when I couldn’t find a simply formatted results database. Most of the results were scraped from two websites that don’t exist anymore. Technically, obviously, all the results are out there. Just not in a neat file. But now they are. And they’re updated monthly. It is one of the most popular datasets on Kaggle.

item.title: Fantasy League History Website
item.description: This is a website tracking the NBA fantasy league I’ve played in since 2006. The main reason for its creation was that most of the websites hosting fantasy games do not keep the leagues' histories. By now the website is does not only keep the historic records but displays all kinds of statistics of league, which has added greatly to the enjoyment of the game.
